Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: nesta
Reviews.Content: I bought this cell phone for someone and the response I got from them makes me want to get one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Felt more like a toy phone but does work
Reviews.Author: H.L. Pfister
Reviews.Content: The plastic on this phone feels like something from a kids toy.  It does work as a phone and the buttons are fine, I just had a hard time navigating the menu and the instruction book was not very informative.  I guess you get what you pay for.  It is something that is good as a temporary phone if your main one breaks, but I would not recommend it for long term use.  But I did find it neat that you could put two sim cards in it.  Definitely a neat idea.  I decided to keep mine just in case my current 4 year old Nokia Music Xpress decides to bite the dust.  Might be a good phone for someone who tends to lose or break their phones often, at least you won't lose a lot of money!
